name: Ruth  Stern
what_you_do: Ruth Stern is a soulful breakthrough Business Coach who helps Conscious Entrepreneurs create a 6 figure income, attract their ideal clients, and do the work they love.
who_you_serve: Conscious Entrepreneurs who have a mission to serve and make a difference but struggle to make the income they desire.
social_proof: Ruth is a nationally certified EFT Trainer and has trained over 200 professionals in EFT - Emotional Freedom Techniques.
signature_programs: Success Mindset Breakthrough Program, Client Attraction Blueprint, Abundance Immersion Program, Freedom From Anxiety, 4 Steps To Blissful Sleep
business_focus: Ruth helps conscious entrepreneurs create a 6 figure income, attract their ideal clients, and do the work they love.
service_provided: business coaching, mindset coaching, spiritual coaching
